Product Brief:
The Loyalty Platform is a new feature that enables our merchant customers to track and reward their customers who make repeat transactions. The loyalty platform also provides additional buyer insights for our customers. With this platform, our merchant customers can efficiently track and reward their loyal customers while also gaining valuable insights into their customer base.

Release Notes:
The Loyalty Platform release introduces the following new functionality:

* A loyalty platform that enables our merchant customers to track and reward their customers who make repeat transactions and provides additional buyer insights
* Customizable loyalty program to maximize the value for customers
* Integration with existing marketing platforms to easily promote loyalty programs to customers

Internal FAQs:

1. What is the Loyalty Platform?
The Loyalty Platform is a new feature that enables our merchant customers to track and reward their customers who make repeat transactions. The loyalty platform also provides additional buyer insights for our customers.
2. How does the Loyalty Platform work?
The Loyalty Platform allows merchants to assign rewards to their customers for repeat purchases, track customer data to understand behaviour and preferences better, and customize the loyalty program to their individual needs.
3. Can the Loyalty Platform be integrated with existing marketing platforms?
Yes, the Loyalty Platform can be integrated with existing marketing platforms to easily promote loyalty programs to customers.

External FAQs:

1. What is the Loyalty Platform?
The Loyalty Platform is a new feature that enables merchants to track and reward their customers who make repeat transactions. The loyalty platform also provides additional buyer insights.
2. How do I access the Loyalty Platform?
The Loyalty Platform is accessible through the merchant dashboard.
3. How do I assign rewards to my customers?
Merchants can assign rewards to their customers through the Loyalty Platform and can customize the loyalty program to maximize the value for their customers.

User Documentation:
The Loyalty Platform User Guide provides step-by-step instructions for merchants to use the new functionality. The guide includes information on how to track customer data, assign rewards, customize the loyalty program, and integrate with existing marketing platforms.

Newsletter Entry:
Introducing our new Loyalty Platform! Our merchant customers can now efficiently track and reward their loyal customers while also gaining valuable insights into their customer base. With customizable loyalty programs and integration with existing marketing platforms, the Loyalty Platform is the perfect tool to maximize customer loyalty.
